divs: Sighting DetailsWAS IN THE BACK YARD WITH GRAND KIDS.SAW THIS BRIGHT LIGHT OVER HEAD IT STARTED GETING CLOSER TO US THEN IT STOPED OVER OUR PATIO,I GOT MY PHONE OUT STARTED TAKING VIDEOS OF THE OBJECT IT WAS 20FT AWAY.THEN 4 HUMEN LIKE PEOPLE JUMPED OFF ON TO MY PATIO,THEN THATS WHEN MY GRAND KIDS STARTED SCREANING BECAUSE THEY SAW THEM.I HURRYED UP GOT THE GRAND KIDS INTO THE HOUSE.I THEN WENT BACK OUT THE OJECT MOVED OVER TO THE NEIGHTORS HOUSE.I ALLSO GOT VIDEOS OF IT.FROM JUN OF 08-09 I HAVE 600 PICTURES,100 VIDEOS,20 PICTURES OF UFO UNDERGROUD BASSES THAT OUR GOVERMENT BUILD FOR THEM. PLEASE HELP ME DONT NO WHO TO TURN TO. THEY FLY OVER EVERY NIGHT ABOUT 15 OF THEM TILL 530AM. hELP PLEASE.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
